entry.title: Syntax Highlighting
entry.content:
You're all programmers, right? Yeah. So you want some highlighting with your static site generation? Here you go!

namespace Foo;

/**
 * Awesome Contrived Example.
 */
class Bar implements BarInterface
{
    private $baz;

    public function __construct(BazInterface $baz)
    {
        $this->baz = $baz;
    }

    public function doIt()
    {
        return $this->baz->do('it');
    }
}

When writing new content for this site you can use fenced code blocks with a syntax declaration at the top.

You can use either ~ or ` to mark them.
